channel.title: Requirements for a Pure
channel.description:
So with the old servers coming back, what do you guys think makes a good pure? I mean, obviously its more about how you PK, but what is the best gear you guys can come up with?
For 1 defence I've come up with
[ul][li]D Scimmy[/li] [li]DDS[/li] [li]Mith gloves (Addy if we can get back on Ape Atoll without taking the reward)[/li] [li]Ancient Magiks[/li][/ul]
And the list of requirements for these seemingly simple items: [code]Quests: * Monkey Madness * The Grand Tree * Tree Gnome Village * Desert Treasure * The Dig Site * Druidic Ritual * The Tourist Trap * Temple of Ikov * Priest in Peril * Troll Stronghold * Death Plateau * Waterfall Quest * Lost City * Horror From The Deep * Recipe for Disaster * Goblin Diplomacy * Fishing Contest * Gertrude's Cat * Shadow of the Storm * Demon Slayer * The Golem * Big Chompy Bird Hunting * Biohazard * Plague City * Demon Slayer * Murder Mystery * Nature Spirit * The Restless Ghost * Priest in Peril * Witch's House
Skills: * 47 Agility (48 for Addy gloves) * 41 Cooking (70 for Addy gloves) * 10 Fishing * 10 Slayer * 10 Herblore * 10 Fletching * 20 Smithing * 31 Crafting * 36 Woodcutting * 40 Ranged * 50 Mining (Optional) * 50 Firemaking * 50 Magic * 53 Thieving [/code]

item.title: Requirements for a Pure
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

the elve age:

Ive made several pures, you have a good list

It’s just the run of the mill 1def melee/ice barrage pure for 2007. Although I did forget to add Horror from the Deep for the prayer books!

I’d like it if people posted some more interesting builds and what gear they like to use, how they pk with them, etc

Read full topic

item.title: Requirements for a Pure
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

I’ve never really been a fan of elvemage, I like melee better

Also: there are all kinds of builds that could be done, so please post what your ideal one is and I will come up with the list of requirements needed.

Read full topic

one word… elvemage.

item.title: Requirements for a Pure
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

So with the old servers coming back, what do you guys think makes a good pure? I mean, obviously its more about how you PK, but what is the best gear you guys can come up with?

For 1 defence I’ve come up with

[ul][li]D Scimmy[/li]
[li]DDS[/li]
[li]Mith gloves (Addy if we can get back on Ape Atoll without taking the reward)[/li]
[li]Ancient Magiks[/li][/ul]

And the list of requirements for these seemingly simple items:

[code]Quests:

  • Monkey Madness
    • The Grand Tree
    • Tree Gnome Village
  • Desert Treasure
    • The Dig Site
      • Druidic Ritual
    • The Tourist Trap
    • Temple of Ikov
    • Priest in Peril
    • Troll Stronghold
      • Death Plateau
    • Waterfall Quest
  • Lost City
  • Horror From The Deep
  • Recipe for Disaster
    • Goblin Diplomacy
    • Fishing Contest
    • Gertrude’s Cat
    • Shadow of the Storm
      • Demon Slayer
      • The Golem
    • Big Chompy Bird Hunting
    • Biohazard
      • Plague City
    • Demon Slayer
    • Murder Mystery
    • Nature Spirit
      • The Restless Ghost
    • Priest in Peril
    • Witch’s House

Skills:

  • 47 Agility (48 for Addy gloves)
  • 41 Cooking (70 for Addy gloves)
  • 10 Fishing
  • 10 Slayer
  • 10 Herblore
  • 10 Fletching
  • 20 Smithing
  • 31 Crafting
  • 36 Woodcutting
  • 40 Ranged
  • 50 Mining (Optional)
  • 50 Firemaking
  • 50 Magic
  • 53 Thieving
    [/code]

Read full topic
